DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy IQP-PO-101 regulating bowel movement frequency
DOC.criteria: A subject must experience 2 4 bowel movement per week least 2 follow symptom precede 3 month ( selfreported ) : Excessive strain Lumpy hard stool Sensation anorectal obstruction A sense incomplete evacuation bowel movements A need digital manipulation facilitate evacuation Recorded 4 9 defecation 14day bowel movement diary runin period Subjects childbearing potential must agree use appropriate contraceptive method runin treatment period Commitment avoid use laxatives and/ medicinal products/ supplement may interfere bowel movement frequency runin treatment period Written inform consent . Known sensitivity ingredient device Any organic gastrointestinal disease , congenital otherwise Presence occult blood screen Constipation may druginduced Use laxative/ product help ease bowel movement within 7 day screen visit Constipation idiopathic constipation Presence factor ( ) , investigator 's judgement , preclude subject participation
